com.edit.reach.fragments

Class ControlFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.edit.reach.fragments.ControlFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ControlFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This fragment is used for when the vehicle is moving. It shows a status bar and details about the next milestone. The user is able to press buttons representing a certain milestone to add it.
